title: Unable to connect to the server. Error occurred
body:
So, after my league updated (just a quick update), this messaged appeared: 
> Unknown Error
An error has occurred
Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server.
If you continue encountering this error you 
may want to check the support site or forum for more 
information.


Does anyone know what's the cause of this?

replies.body: Yup, there were some server issues per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Everything looks to be okay now.

> [{quoted}](name=Airunami,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iXne5q6i,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-22T01:01:42.931+0000)
>
> So, after my league updated (just a quick update), this messaged appeared: 
> &gt; Unknown Error
> An error has occurred
> Sorry about that. We&#039;ve sent a report to the server.
> If you continue encountering this error you 
> may want to check the support site or forum for more
